mn140:2.1: viharemu āvesane → viharāma āvesane (bj); viharāma nivesane (sya-all, km); viharāmāvesane (pts-vp-pli1ed); viharemu nivesane (mr)
mn140:6.2: mamañca khvāyaṃ → mamaṃ khvāyaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); maṃ khvāyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn140:8.3: Chayimā, bhikkhu, dhātuyo → etthantare pāṭho si, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mn140:19.2: Tena ca viññāṇena kiṃ → tena viññāṇena kiñci (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn140:20.2: ninnītakasāvaṃ → nihaṭakasāvaṃ (bj); nihatakasāvaṃ (mr) | sudhantaṃ niddhantaṃ → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu | jātarūpaṃ → jātarūpaṃ dhantaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nīhaṭaṃ → nihataṃ (si, sya-all, km, mr) | paṭṭikāya → pavaddhikāya (bj); pavaṭṭikāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn140:35.2: vibbhantā gāvī → bhantagāvī (si, pts-vp-pli1ed), vibhantagāvī (si), gāvī (sya-all, km)
mn140:36.4: vihesesi → viheṭhesi (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); viheseti (mr)
